title: Identify the Unknown
text: We are looking for the total distance traveled and we can name it "d"
speech: We are looking for the total distance traveled and we can name it "d"
pacedSpeech: We are looking for the total distance traveled and we can name it "d"

title: Translate
text: We can use the formula $$distance=rate time$$ --> $$d=rt$$
speech: We can use the formula  distance is equal to, ratetime  -->  d, is equal to r t

-->   d, is equal to r t

title: Substitute
text: Since we are given that the rate is $$3$$ mph and the time is $$\frac{7}{3}$$ hours, we can $$substituter=3$$, $$t=\frac{7}{3}$$ and get $$d=3\frac{7}{3}$$.
speech: Since we are given that the rate is  3  mph and the time is  7 thirds  hours, we can  substituter is equal to 3 ,  t, is equal to, 7 thirds  and get  d, is equal to, 3 and 7 thirds .

mph and the time is   7 thirds
hours, we can   substituter is equal to 3

title: Solve
text: Solve $$\frac{3\times7}{3}$$ to find the distance in miles. What is the distance?
